<a id="class_XRTracker"></a>

# XRTracker

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [XRFaceTracker](class_xrfacetracker.md), [XRPositionalTracker](class_xrpositionaltracker.md)

A tracked object.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object is the base of all XR trackers.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [XR documentation index](../tutorials/xr/index.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_XRTracker_property_description"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **description** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_XRTracker_property_description)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tracker_desc**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_tracker_desc**\ (\ )

The description of this tracker.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRTracker_property_name"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **name** = `&"Unknown"` [ðŸ”—](#class_XRTracker_property_name)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tracker_name**\ (\ value\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ )
- [StringName](class_stringname.md) **get_tracker_name**\ (\ )

The unique name of this tracker. The trackers that are available differ between various XR runtimes and can often be configured by the user. Redot maintains a number of reserved names that it expects the [XRInterface](class_xrinterface.md) to implement if applicable:

- ``"head"`` identifies the [XRPositionalTracker](class_xrpositionaltracker.md) of the player's head

- ``"left_hand"`` identifies the [XRControllerTracker](class_xrcontrollertracker.md) in the player's left hand

- ``"right_hand"`` identifies the [XRControllerTracker](class_xrcontrollertracker.md) in the player's right hand

- ``"/user/hand_tracker/left"`` identifies the [XRHandTracker](class_xrhandtracker.md) for the player's left hand

- ``"/user/hand_tracker/right"`` identifies the [XRHandTracker](class_xrhandtracker.md) for the player's right hand

- ``"/user/body_tracker"`` identifies the [XRBodyTracker](class_xrbodytracker.md) for the player's body

- ``"/user/face_tracker"`` identifies the [XRFaceTracker](class_xrfacetracker.md) for the player's face

<hr class="classref-item-separator">
